trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Moa-Mosch has a supernatural story to share.

TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Ismella” to challenge the spirit on the bridge.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_000<tab>Do you want to hear a ghost story? Of course you do...
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_001<tab>The old pig farm over yonder once belonged to a family known as the “Greelys.”

TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_002<tab>It was around, oh, ten winters ago now that their entire sty was butchered by a pack of wild animals. The farm never recovered, and the family scattered to the winds.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_003<tab>The Greelys' daughter and her betrothed sought refuge here in Wright, but misfortune's grasp would not surrender them so easily.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_004<tab>The lad was slain by Dikaiosyne last year, when the eater attacked our village...
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_005<tab>And the lass, mad with grief, threw herself from the bridge that bears her family's name. Drowned right there in the river.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_006<tab>Ever since, folk have avoided that spot, convinced that Greely Bridge is haunted by the girl's anguished spirit.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_007<tab>You think the tale a tall one? Go to the bridge yourself, then, and call out her name─“Ismella.”
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_008<tab>Go on, then. Stand atop Greely Bridge and call the spirit for yourself. “Ismella” was her name...

TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing “Ismella” to call forth the spirit said to lurk beneath the bridge.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_020<tab>There were <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> spirits!? Ah, I think I see─the young lady was with child...
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_021<tab>...It truly was the ghost of Ismella, then.
TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_022<tab>May their souls be returned to the sea of stars. We can but pray that such tragedy never again visits us in this lifetime...

TEXT_LUCKZA016_03358_MOAMOSCH_000_023<tab>And pray forgive my frivolous words from before. I had thought only to give you a fright, and instead you gifted those spirits with the peace they deserved. Thank you...
